title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: If you borrow money or wan borrow money from loans apps rest assured say you go fit drink water drop cup and nobody to dey call your brother, uncle, aunty, friend or papa say you dey owe them. Why? The Federal Competition and Consumer Protection Commission (FCCPC) for we country don give d go ahead to 173 digital lending applications to take operate for we country, 119 of dem get full approval and 54 of them collect conditional approval. Na since last year wey the FCCPC  comot registration and d wey these loan app go operation because of how dem take dey harass Nigerians untop loan. We government make am compulsory say any loan company must register their business before dem operate. Na this March 27, 2023 wey just pass so na him be d deadline wey dem put for registration. As the deadline don pass now, the FCCPC come release the list of the apps wey dem approve. As e be now, dem go commot apps wey dem nor approve from Google play store. This one still follow wey make Google Play Store update their Developer Program Policy to talk say if you wan run loan business for Naija, you need to obey the regulatory rules for digital money lenders.Still if you dey borrow make you use your head.See some of the approved loan apps here:SYCAMORE INTEGRATED SOLUTIONS LIMITEDTRADE DEPOT TAJOW INVESTMENTBLUE RIDGE MICROFINANCE BANK LIMITEDGROLATECH CREDIT LIMITEDBRANCH INTERNATIONAL FINANCIAL SERVICES LIMITEDP2VEST TECHNOLOGY LIMITEDCREDITWAVE FINANCE LIMITEDKEENEST TECH SERVICE LIMITEDFAIRMONEY MICRO FINANCE BANKALTRACRED FINANCE INVESTMENT LIMITEDCREVANCE CREDIT LIMITEDMENACRED COMPANY LIMITEDAFROWIDE DEVELOPMENT LTDRED PLANET NIGERIA LIMITEDAFROFIRST MOBILE AND TECHNOLOGY COMPANY LIMITEDRANKCAPITAL LIMITEDIBS GOLDEN INVESTMENT COMPANY LIMITEDLENDVISERY SERVICES LIMITEDRENMONEY MICROFINANCE BANK LIMITEDSee the full list here1 https://fccpc.gov.ng/registration-status-for-digital-money-lenders-apps/2 https://punchng.com/FG-approves-173-loan-apps-bars-illegal-online-banks/

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on April 04, 2023, 01:54:13 PMMy brother, the thing been don too much o, no be small harassment way these loan apps dey give person and Nigerians kwa no been get joy. Them go just borrow as them like with the intention say, them no go pay. Only wayin dey there mind be say, na contacts them go paste with calls, WhatsApp messages here and there then e don finish. Omo, the wahala no be small. Na so I dey see the full profile of one of my classmate all the way from when I dey secondary school.  E shock me no be small, person way I no been even remember en existence and in one move, I see all about  and what his been up to lately. E just dey bad but, na the only way them been get yo try recover there money be that.Where the matter con cast be say, after you don cassette person like that, who go like pay the loan kwanu... you don cast the person packaging and that na something you no go fit undo.The matter still remains say, if you borrow money to use help your life, try dey pay back. At least, it helped at that time and the only way of reciprocating that love na to pay back. On top of that, try to dey avoid to borrow, to pay no sweet so, avoid to borrow.

comments.body: I nor dey use all this loan app before their wahala nor be here….them ready to send your details give Aso Rock if you miss payment. comments.body: I dey sure say this one go be better news for people wey dey take loan from apps and no wan pay, most especially people wey don take current loan and yet their loan apps no con dey among the approved registered ones, as they go cease that as an opportunity not to pay anymore.But if I may ask, where "Palmcredit, Fairmoney, Ease cash, 9Credit, Nairaloan and Easybuy" dem all dey? Because if there is any loan app which I expected to see among the top 5 na "PalmCredit and Fairmoney" wey no dey free person rest with their many display ads on YouTube played whenever watching an online content.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: The way most of those loan apps operated was really out of control, based on what I have heard so far about them. A friend told me he got a call from one of their agents and was threatened with being arrested if he failed to repay his loan that day. But whats always the agreement between these loan apps and the borrower before they offer them the loan? They don't even request collateral before giving out loans, and when the borrower defaults on repayment, they begin to issue threats. LoL is funny, though.

My brother, na them dey operate majorly and na them self fit dey profit pass all these names wey dey here. Wetin concern the common man wey hurry dey catch with all this one wey federal government dey talk. Already people dey patronize local loans dealers wey worst pass this apps wey government commot their name for the approved loans apps. For this country wetin legit na wetin dey deliver e no matter whether e dey approved or not. Just take example from ponzi schemes wey been reign for the county. People know say e no dey registered but wetin concern them, dem still participate because hunger dey land.Anyways na very good initiative wey the government dey do be this and thank you for bringing this update here. Abeg anything about the collateral for this apps abi na free? This loan apps really help people between last 5 years because many students use am dey hold body when nothing dey and e get some struggling parents/businesses wey also benefits but true true dem no try for the disturbance level wey the apps dem get. You owning just few hours after deadline, you go begin they receive threats like say you thief and you fit even dey discourage to payback self.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Well to me, I never really borrow money from all this online loan apps shall, but I dey really receive numerous disgraceful message on my phone line based on say some of my contacts fit don collect loan from the apps, some of them dey even call and Even call the people name for me, e even reach when Dem come dey send the debtors their pictures on WhatsApp with plenty warning write ups. But if FCCPC don put body for the matter to address the loaners and put them on the right path as you Don talk am, I go really appreciate am because atleast e go really save people from so many disgraceful acts from the loan apps.And again too make debtors wey dey collect loan from the app too try dey pay back when due, to avoid embarrassment, no be say you go collect loan finish when  e reach for you to pay, you go dey do shakara, come dey make the loaners to dey send plenty embarrassing messages to your contacts, e no good abeg

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: One development that I will like to see in Nigeria with all these tech and app developers who have constantly developed loan apps and other financial technologies to carry out both good and bad services such as the scam loaning apps that are voliating the rights of the citizens and all the other negative vibes in the financial sector in Nigeria, bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies have played a great role in providing alternative means of financial transactions and this has proven significantly successful in the past few years. I want to see an app where I can spend my Bitcoin using Bitcoin to make financial transactions such as payments to third-party banks since that loan app has developers that can access any one phone number if allowed by the party at the time of request of loan, why not chanel that energy into developing something more useful.

comments.body: Nice one,it has been a serious problem especially in this country Nigeria, because alot has sold their soul to devil incarnate that they don't care if you it is your last money that you us to invest on their app, and I would have still like if they can start going about arrest the app owner of such app with the intention of scamming people all over the world..Because I could remember what happened to me during the time of MMM I really regret registering to that app thenAnd alot of them have come and gone with people 's money so I love what just happened, banned all the fake ones let the legit one move on and make life so easier for people to participate and earn money 🤑💰💰🤑🤑💰 ok..

comments.body: The reason why loan apps been they use call finish people na because so many people go collect loans and would refuse to pay, these loan apps agents go call them tire, send them messages and they still no go gree pay, me i no like the idea of calling friends, family and relatives of the person wey take loan, because them been no they there when you give the person loan, they were never guarantors or sureties to the loan, so why you go they disturb them with calls. My main problem na with people wey no they gree pay back their loan, these loan defaulters are the real menace.Having said that, now wey them they licenced, e no go hard them to arrest loan defaulters and prosecute them by law, before them no fit do like that because them they operate unregulated and unlicensed business, but now i know say things go change, so people wey they plan to take loan and run, they better change their mind oh.

In general, Avoid loan apps if you can.
